import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBInput, MDBIcon, MDBCheckbox } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; function PaymentForm() { const {message,setMessage } = useState(""); return (

Payment Details

Please enter your required Information

{message}

); } export default PaymentForm;
